definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate

sentences.english: Papa would bring an old battered coal shovel and an old-fashioned ice chest with him.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷总会带来一把破旧的煤铲和一台老式冰柜。

sentences.english: An old man, a shabby boat and a vast sea.
sentences.chinese: 一个老人，一只破旧的船与一片茫茫大海。

sentences.english: They are quite worn out. Marmee must have a new pair.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子太破旧了，妈咪得换双新的。

sentences.english: The fenders had fallen off that old bus.
sentences.chinese: 保险杠已从那辆破旧的汽车上脱落下来。

sentences.english: A dilapidated house stands disconsolately amid the rabbles.
sentences.chinese: 一栋破旧的房子凄凉地耸立在断垣残壁中。

sentences.english: There were a lot of beat-up VW vans around.
sentences.chinese: 周围有很多破旧的大众牌汽车。

sentences.english: After the besiege of Beijing, Li Zicheng became dilapidated.
sentences.chinese: 后围攻北京，李自成变得破旧。

sentences.english: There was clearly nothing left to do but flop down on the shabby little couch and howl.
sentences.chinese: 除了扑到破旧的小沙发里嚎哭显然别无他法。

sentences.english: To "think outside the box" is to try new ways to solve a problem.
sentences.chinese: 破旧立新的意思就是要用新方法解决问题。

sentences.english: A lover of revolvers , rivers, and the poor house.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢左轮手枪，小河和破旧的房子。

sentences.english: Pumice stones are used in the wash to create a worn look.
sentences.chinese: 水洗时用浮岩石头会带来一种破旧的感觉。

sentences.english: His depiction of modern Kenya, in all its scruffy sadness, was pitch-perfect.
sentences.chinese: 他对现代肯尼亚那种破旧感的描绘，达到了完美。

sentences.english: The shabby red piano seat is long enough for two people to sit side by side.
sentences.chinese: 破旧的红色琴凳够得着两人并排而坐。

sentences.english: In the bare room under the roof, there was a small, battered valise on his BED.
sentences.chinese: 在楼顶下面空房间的床上，放着一只破旧的小旅行包。

sentences.english: Even though she was worn-out, it was the ball with the leather jacket.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已经破旧不堪，那东西就是裹着皮外套的球。

sentences.english: The orphan wore shabby clothes and had nowhere to go.
sentences.chinese: 这个孤儿穿着破旧的衣服，无处可去。

definition: old and in a state of disrepair (idiom)/dilapidated
